Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an unlit torch fitted loosely in a holder on the opposite wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, very colorful pamphlet.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The chest is made of wood and wrapped with iron bands. The lock appears to have been picked.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find an urn that appears to be from Ancient Greece. This could be worth a lot to the right people.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find around two hundred gold coins in the bottom of the chest!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long, thin steel rapier. An inscription on the handle says, "Jacques" in scripted letters.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a metal key that the rogue had concealed in his pocket.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The large wooden door is made of very hard wood and looks very sturdy.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dead body here. Upon further inspection, you see that is was a young adventurer. There are four or five arrows sticking in his back, and there is a pool of fresh blood under the body.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a good-quality spear clutched in the corpse's hand.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a leather adventurer's backpack here. The adventurer was apparently not wearing the backpack at the time of his demise for there are no arrows stuck in it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a torch similar to the one you found in the entryway.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a flask containing a purple substance. The flask is labeled "Hale 'N' Hearty." There appears to be enough for several swigs.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a kobold's short bow.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a kobold's short bow.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a kobold's short sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a kobold's short bow.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an elven long sword here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an elven long bow here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a massive war hammer here that is partially embedded in the mural next to the painting of Thor. You could take it from the wall. The weapon is steel with inlaid jewels and looks devastating in its power.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a book bound in bright red fake leather on a shelf on the south wall. The title reads, "Using Lizards in your Alchemical Concoctions."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a green book bound in the skin of an alligator or something. The title reads "The Metaphysical Ramblings of Leonard the New-Age Prophet." This book is shelved in the north bookshelf.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a purple book which is shelved on the east wall. The title reads "The Life and Times of Thaddeus the Scholar."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: In one of the cubbyholes you see a beat up old wooden scroll case.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a plain white scroll which was rolled up inside the scroll case. To your surprise you can read the scroll even with your limited magical experience.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a scroll case made of the black obsidian. The case has not a scratch on it and radiates a strong aura of magic.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the Emerald Warrior's broadsword, the "Jade Blade".

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small sack of silver coins on the floor. It looks as if some careless adventurer must have dropped this.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long wooden staff that has an amethyst set in one end. There is an inscription along the length of it that reads, "Zapf the Conjurer."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The portcullis is a huge iron gate that can be easily raised or lowered from a winch on the wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The portcullis is a huge iron gate that can be easily raised or lowered from a winch on the wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small vial filled with a red liquid. There's not much there but it looks pretty potent.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small vial filled with a blue liquid. There's not much there but it looks pretty potent.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pile of brass coins here. The pile is big - more than two hundred coins - but brass isn't worth much compared to gold.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a brooch made of wrought silver and gold. It looks fairly valuable.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a pile of about two hundred gold coins!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large golden yellow topaz. It is a quite precious gemstone.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a scroll case made of the black obsidian. The case has not a scratch on it and radiates a strong aura of magic.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
